Subject: Service Tenure Offer - Skyline Media & [Client Company Name/Project Name]

Dear [Client Contact Name],

We are pleased to formally present our service tenure offer, which you will find attached to this email as a PDF document.

This letter outlines the details for our proposed 12-month service agreement, with a monthly fee of $1500. We propose a commencement date of October 15, 2025, for the services.

We encourage you to review the attached offer letter at your convenience, as it details the full terms and conditions of our proposed partnership.

Should you have any questions or require further clarification on any aspect of the offer, please do not hesitate to reach out. We are happy to schedule a call to discuss this further.

We are very much looking forward to the opportunity to work with you and contribute to your success.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
Skyline Media

letter_markdown:
**Skyline Media**
123 Digital Way, Suite 400
Innovate City, CA 90210
(555) 123-4567 | info@skylinemedia.com | www.skylinemedia.com

---

**October 10, 2026**

Alex Chen
456 Creative Lane, Apt 7B
Innovate City, CA 90210
alex.chen@email.com

---

### Confirmation of Tenure – Alex Chen

Dear Alex Chen,

It is with immense pleasure that Skyline Media formally confirms your **tenure**, effective **October 15, 2026**. This significant milestone acknowledges the successful completion of your initial period and reflects our profound appreciation for your consistent excellence and substantial contributions to our team.

#### Tenure Details

Your confirmed tenure period will span **twelve (12) months**, during which your monthly compensation will be **$1,500**. This compensation reflects your valued expertise and commitment to our ongoing success.

#### Key Responsibilities & Benchmarks

During this tenure, your primary responsibilities and performance benchmarks will include, but are not limited to, the following critical areas, all essential to our shared objectives:

*   **Comprehensive Monthly Performance Evaluations:** *Timely and insightful submission of performance reports.*
*   **Strategic SEO Optimization:** *Proactive implementation and management of SEO initiatives to enhance digital presence.*
*   **Innovative Advertising Creatives:** *Conception, design, and development of compelling and effective advertising campaigns.*

This confirmation aligns with all established *Skyline Media policies*, operational procedures, and the terms outlined in your initial engagement agreement. We have unwavering confidence in your continued ability to not only meet but *exceed* these expectations, driving significant impact for Skyline Media.

We are genuinely enthusiastic about your continued presence as an *integral* part of the Skyline Media team and eagerly anticipate your future contributions to our collective achievements and sustained growth.

Should you have any questions regarding this tenure confirmation, please do not hesitate to contact the HR Department or your direct manager.

Sincerely,

**[Hiring Manager Name]**
Hiring Manager
Skyline Media
